tool.name: Aggregate datapoints
tool.description: Appends the average, min, max of datapoints per interval
tool.help:
**Syntax**
This tool add columns of summary info for each interval against a provided dataset. For each of the given intervals, compute the average, minimum, maximum of data falling within the interval. The five columns representing these values are appended to the input file.
- Several quantitative scores are provided for the ENCODE regions.
- Various Scores - Regulatory Potential - Neutral rate (Ancestral Repeats) - GC fraction - Conservation Scores - PhastCons - binCons - GERP
-----
**Example**
If your original query has the following format:
+-----+-----+---+-----+ |chrom|start|end|other| +-----+-----+---+-----+
and you choose to aggregate phastCons scores, your output will look like this:
+-----+-----+---+-----+---+---+---+ |chrom|start|end|other|ave|min|max| +-----+-----+---+-----+---+---+---+
where:
* **ave** - average phastCons score for each region * **min** - minimal phastCons score for each region * **max** - maximum phastCons score for each region
